knimeNode.name: XLS Primary Model Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Load models and data from an Excel file

fullDescription.intro: This nodes enables the user to import models and microbial data into PMM-Lab. All entries are matched with the database
fullDescription.option: Choose a Microsoft Excel file and select a spreadsheet
Define whether to view the temperature in degrees Celsius or Fahrenheit

Assign a reference to the data / model. In order choose your own reference this needs to be entered manually. Another option is to enter the database via the Knime menu 'PMM-Lab' -> 'Open DB GUI...' where also *.ris files can be imported.
Assign a model from the database
Choose a column from the XLS file and assign to every organism / matrix one equivalent from the database
Assign to every column from the Excel sheet a column from the database table 'Test conditions'
